model_description.name: BasicAdder
model_description.description: A basic adder model that accepts two numeric inputs (arg1 and arg2), processes them, and outputs their sum. The model transitions through states WAIT_A1, WAIT_A2, and SUM during its operation.

inputs.name: arg1
inputs.description: The first input argument for the adder. Represents an integer.

inputs.name: arg2
inputs.description: The second input argument for the adder. Represents an integer.

outputs.name: sum
outputs.description: The output representing the sum of arg1 and arg2.

states.name: WAIT_A1
states.description: The state where the model is waiting for the first argument (arg1).

states.name: WAIT_A2
states.description: The state where the model is waiting for the second argument (arg2).

states.name: SUM
states.description: The state where the model calculates the sum of arg1 and arg2 and outputs the result.

requirements: Test boundary values for arg1 and arg2, including minimum, typical, and maximum values (e.g., -1000, 0, 1000).
Verify that the model correctly transitions between states WAIT_A1, WAIT_A2, and SUM.
Ensure the sum output is accurate for positive, negative, and zero inputs.
Test scenarios where inputs are provided out of sequence or incomplete to validate error handling.

test_cases.description: Test addition of two positive numbers.
Test addition of two negative numbers.
Test sequential addition of two sets of numbers.
